title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 01 May 2013 - XWiki

05:24 <jbwiv\_> guys, I've changed the logo to xwiki and on the XWiki.DefaultSkin page it shows my new logo, but all the pages still show the old logo in the upper left-hand corner, even after server restart. is there some caching enabled which could cause this? What else do I need to do?  
05:27 <sdumitriu> jbwiv\_: The current color theme can also override the logo  
05:27 <sdumitriu> Check there  
05:28 <jbwiv\_> sdumitriu: ok, I'm using the ruby color theme...maybe that's it. thanks  
05:29 <jbwiv\_> sdumitriu: do you know where you go to edit color themes? I see reference online to a separate color theme space, but I don't seem to have that  
05:40 <jbwiv\_> sdumitriu: that was it. thank you!  
05:51 <Denis> has quit  
06:14 <jbwiv\_> is there a way to pull rss feeds from XWiki blogs?  
06:14 <sdumitriu> Yes  
06:15 <sdumitriu> The blog RSS is already exposed in the page  
06:15 <sdumitriu> Should be something like http://localhost:8080/xwiki/bin/Blog/GlobalBlogRss?xpage=plain  
06:16 <sdumitriu> And there are feeds for each category as well  
06:19 <jbwiv\_> sdumitriu: awesome. thank you!  
06:19 <jbwiv\_> is it recommended to create a separate space for each blog you have?  
06:21 <sdumitriu> Depends on what you're trying to do  
06:21 <sdumitriu> Normally you should use just one  
06:21 <sdumitriu> And use categories to split posts  
06:22 <jbwiv\_> sdumitriu: I'd like to give each business unit we have its own blog  
06:22 <jbwiv\_> really wish there were a print book on xwiki and xwiki best practices. it seems very powerful and flexible, but the flexibility can be daunting at times  
06:24 <sdumitriu> Then you should create different blogs  
06:25 <sdumitriu> Not sure if you know about /xwiki/bin/Blog/Management  
06:25 <jbwiv\_> sdumitriu: now I'm not sure. I'm thinking maybe it'd be better to create a Company News space and then create a separate category for each biz unit  
06:26 <sdumitriu> The main blog (in the blog space) will aggregate all the other blogs anyway  
06:27 <jbwiv\_> sdumitriu: ok, thanks. wonder if I should create a Blog space, then separate blogs within this space?  
06:29 <sdumitriu> You can't do that  
06:29 <jbwiv\_> sdumitriu: ok, so only one blog per space?  
06:29 <sdumitriu> A blog assumes every post in its space  
06:30 <jbwiv\_> sdumitriu: ok, thank you  
06:43 <jbwiv\_> sdumitriu: how long have you used xwiki if you don't mind me asking? do you tend to hit a lot of errors? I've somehow been able to crash mine a number of times so far....  
06:44 <sdumitriu> I've been using it for more than 7 years  
06:44 <sdumitriu> How exactly crash?  
06:45 <jbwiv\_> sdumitriu: well, the latest: Exception: java.lang.OutOfMemoryError thrown from the UncaughtExceptionHandler in thread "http://wiki-dev.timco.aero/xwiki/bin/Blog/GlobalBlogRss?xpage=plain"  
06:45 <jbwiv\_> I have "-Xmx2048m" configured for the process  
06:45 <jbwiv\_> and I'm the only current user  
06:46 <jbwiv\_> so I'd be really surprised if I've pushed it beyond those limits  
06:46 <jbwiv\_> unless it needs more ram than this for typical use  
06:48 <sdumitriu> What about permgen?  
06:48 <sdumitriu> -XX:MaxPermSize=  
06:48 <jbwiv\_> sdumitriu: I haven't specified that, so I assume the JVM default  
06:48 <sdumitriu> That's not enough  
06:48 <sdumitriu> -XX:MaxPermSize=192m  
06:49 <jbwiv\_> sdumitriu: ah, ok, I'll try that  
06:50 <jbwiv\_> I missed that from the Perf page. So it also seems to say I shouldn't go beyond 1024 for heap? guess I should lower this?  
06:50 <jbwiv\_> or is that 1024 for all I wonder  
06:50 <sdumitriu> Well, I don't agree with that  
06:50 <sdumitriu> Personally I use even 4G without any problems  
06:52 <jbwiv\_> sdumitriu: ok. but you think 196 is plenty for permsize? ultimately, I'll have close to 3400 users  
06:52 <sdumitriu> Yes, should be enough  
06:55 <jbwiv\_> sdumitriu: you've been very helpful. thank you. do you happen to do any xwiki consulting?  
06:56 <sdumitriu> Personally, no, I don't have the time  
06:56 <sdumitriu> I can answer questions from time to time  
06:57 <sdumitriu> But http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/Support lists some options  
06:57 <jbwiv\_> sdumitriu: ok, thanks. Have a great evening/morning/whatever ;-)  
06:58 <sdumitriu> You're welcome  
07:15 <jbwiv\_> sdumitriu: I see that the rss feed pulls all data from all blogs. Is there a way to only get rss data from one blog?  
07:28 <jbwiv\_> nm, think I have it
